translation: (1) Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
(2) For that is the one who drives away the orphan
(3) And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
(4) So woe to those who pray
(5) [But] who are heedless of their prayer[2000] -
footnotes: [2000]- i.e., the hypocrites who are unconcerned if they miss prayers when no one sees them.

translation: (6) Those who make show [of their deeds]
